name: Super Duper pt3
description:
CONTROLS

  • LEFT MOUSE - FIRE
  • A - shift left
  • D - shift right
  • F - duplicate! (only in certain cases)
  • SPACE - skip / silence dialog
  • R - reset projectile
  • DELETE - kills all 'bricks' in the level in case you want to skip to experience the story faster

We've all been there.  Some of us still are.  Steve is facing some challenges that are hard to face.  Follow him through his journey in an attempt to clear his head!

Hope you have some fun!

TWITTER   -   YOUTUBE
